txt.en: As you suspected, this part of Fangorn is overrun with spiders
Tiny spiderlings crawl all over the Silkenhold of Fangorn, threatening to grow into larger, crueler, hungrier foes.

The distressed Huorn paces unhappily at the base of some stairs in a quadrant of the forest that fills you with some fear.\n\nYou should investigate what lies atop the stairs, for you suspect a significant spider problem in this area. It appears that these foes are spilling out of their nest.
Stairs lead up to a forebidding area near the Huorn you rescued in northern Fangorn.\n\nYou should climb to stairs to investigate, for you suspect an infestation of spiders.

You have squashed many of the swarming spiderlings in the Silkenhold of Fangorn. The trees in this choked part of the forest may rest assured that the promise of future evil has been somewhat lessened.

Spiderlings crawl all over the forest floor in the Silkenhold.\n\nYou should defeat the spiderlings, for even the young are as evil and fell as their elders, and these monsters do not grow better with age.

You have squashed many of the swarming spiderlings in the Silkenhold of Fangorn. The trees in this choked part of the forest may rest assured that the promise of future evil has been somewhat lessened.
Climb the stairs near the Huorn
